title: Customing
text: fusionPlot fusionPlot object got fusionPlot() showmean Show means drawmeanconnector Connect means lowerboxcolor Set color lower box upperboxcolor Set color upper box mediancolor Set color median line meaniconshape Set shape mean icon meaniconsides Set sides mean icon meaniconradius Set radius mean icon showalloutliers Show outliers outliericonsides Set sides outliers outliericonalpha Set background color transparency outliers outliericonshape Set shape outliers outliericonsradius Set radius outliers

text: fusionPlot fusionPlot object got fusionPlot() palettecolors Specify custom palette data plots usePlotGradientColor Use gradient effect plotGradientColor Specify hex code gradient color plotFillAngle Set fill angle gradient (0 360) plotFillRatioStart Specify start gradient effect plotFillRatioEnd Specify end gradient effect plotFillAlpha Set transparency gradient fill showPlotBorder Show plot border drawFullAreaBorder set top border area chart (works showPlotBorder = TRUE) inheritPlotBorderColor Enable plot border inherit color area plot plotBorderDashed Make border dashed plotBorderDashLen Set length dash plot-border (pixels) plotBorderDashGap Set gap two consecutive dashes plot border (pixels) plotBorderThickness Set thickness plot border plotBorderColor Set color plot border useRoundEdges Enable rounded edges (2D Column Bar charts ) plotHoverEffect Enable hover effects data plots plotFillHoverColor Set hover color data plots hex code format plotFillHoverAlpha Set transparency hover color data plots plotBorderHoverColor Set hover border color plotBorderHoverAlpha Set transparency hover border data plots plotBorderHoverThickness Set hover border thickness (pixels) plotBorderHoverDashed Make dashed borders hover plotBorderHoverDashLen Set length dash data plots hover plotBorderHoverDashGap Set gap two consecutive dashes data plots hover(pixels)

title: Shiny bindings for fusionPlot — fusionPlotOutput

title: Shiny bindings for fusionPlot — fusionPlotOutput
text: outputId output variable read width, height Must valid CSS unit (like '100%', '400px', 'auto') number, coerced string 'px' appended. expr expression generates fusionPlot env environment evaluate expr. quoted expr quoted expression (quote())? useful want save expression variable.

)  object <- ggplot(df, aes(label, values, fill = seriesname)) +   geom_col()  ggfusionPlot(object)
